name: Disney Princess Royal Horse Show
description: Help Disney Princesses prepare for the Royal Horse Show. Players can groom, color, and dress their horses in beautiful accessories to get them ready for the festivities. They can even ride them through the show ring over a variety of obstacles at the Royal Fairgrounds. Featuring 6 horses and 4 princesses: Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, Belle and Snow White. Little girls can decorate the fairgrounds, win awards, and print a scrapbook, trading cards and their very own riding certificates! As a special feature, the game has a "My Princess Desktop Pony" to care for.
